tasks.label: generate cilium manifest
tasks.command: helm template cilium cilium/cilium --version ${input:ciliumVersion} --namespace kube-system --set ipam.mode=kubernetes --set kubeProxyReplacement=true --set securityContext.capabilities.ciliumAgent='{CHOWN,KILL,NET_ADMIN,NET_RAW,IPC_LOCK,SYS_ADMIN,SYS_RESOURCE,DAC_OVERRIDE,FOWNER,SETGID,SETUID}' --set securityContext.capabilities.cleanCiliumState='{NET_ADMIN,SYS_ADMIN,SYS_RESOURCE}' --set cgroup.autoMount.enabled=false --set cgroup.hostRoot=/sys/fs/cgroup --set k8sServiceHost=localhost --set k8sServicePort=7445 > ${workspaceFolder}/tofu/modules/cluster/cilium.yaml

inputs.description: Cilium version to generate the manifest for
